ğŸ“Œ Why you should consider this:

ğŸ“Œ == Features ==

âœ… Say goodbye to long waiting
All existing screenshot extensions scroll page to visible area and then capture it.
Instashot takes different approach. It captured the entire page in a single shot. That's why instashot is fastest.

âœ… Annotate ï¼† Edit before taking screenshot.
Only extensions in chrome web store that allows you to edit page before taking screenshot s.
You can remove, blur, hide & move page's components.
Currently, Only Keyboard shortcuts are available. Press
â™¦ï¸ H â‡’ for hiding component.
â™¦ï¸ Delete â‡’ for removing component.
â™¦ï¸ B â‡’ for blur component.

âœ… Many ways to take screenshots
â‡’ Full page screenshot.
â‡’ Capture visible part.
â‡’ Capture cropped webpage.

âœ… Annotate & Edit Screenshot
â˜› Resize or crop a screenshot to the size you need
â˜› Annotate your screenshot with rectangles, circles, arrows, lines, etc.
â˜› Add text to your screenshot with or without background color, change text font and font size.
â˜› Blur sensitive information on your screenshot.
â˜› Select a local image or paste a copied image from your clipboard to annotate.
â˜› Add stickers.
â˜› Edit using custom css or devtools.
â˜› Add border and padding.

âœ… Multiple export methods that others don't allow you.
Instashot allows you to export as:
â‡’ Download
â‡’ PDF format
â‡’ Clipboard copy
â‡’ Share link
â‡’ Google drive 
â‡’ Dropbox 
â‡’ one drive
â‡’ Slack (coming soon)
â‡’ Box 

âœ… Builtin photo gallery.
â‡’ View all captured screenshots at one image.
â‡’ Share multiple images in one click. (coming soon).


Only Instashot has these export methods:
â‡’ Save in picked local folder (different from download)
â‡’ Gmail inject as attachment or inline.
â‡’ onedrive and box cloud storage support.
 â‡’ Create album of multiple screenshots and share with friends.
